page.title: 16EDUCATION IN MAWNAN
page.content: My typical{school}day begins at 7.30.I get my own{breakfast}something simple and quick like cereal.I get ready and Mrs Richards drives me to school with Steven. School begins at 9:00. In the morning we have Maths or English on Wednesdays. We go to Truro swimming pool which is 13 miles away. School {dinner}is at 12 o'clock. My favourite is roast or stew with chocolate eclairs or mint slice. Half of the children bring pack lunch. At 1:15 we have Topic Work or Craft, then games or Music. Play is at 2:15 to 2:30.At play time the girls play handstands or just walk around and chat. The boys always play football. School finishes at 3:30. I go home and watch T.V and argue with my brother. Sometimes I have a friend to play, we ride on our bikes or on our roller boots. I live 4 miles from my friends.
